duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership to deliver against critical business goals tied to products and programs.
Build a world-class team of program and product managers to drive business engagement and expand core product management capabilities.
Manage product releases and prioritize delivery of mission-critical programs.
Develop product cost models and analytics to benchmark services vs market.
Provide governance, process, and program management for work intake into service pillars.
Identify and mitigate technical risks throughout the delivery life cycle.
Lead business discussions and strategy alignment for global workload service direction.
Develop and maintain relationships with external vendors and service providers.
Ensure products meet all security requirements and comply with external regulations.
Participate in the development and review of IT budgets.
Provide leadership, supervision, coaching, and guidance across team in achievement of internal priorities and goals.
Partner with IT leadership, business unit leaders, and service providers to provide strategic solutions and operational efficiencies.
Work with product owners across the businesses to understand market needs & vision and quickly translate that vision into capabilities.
Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, and leveraging product and technology reuse.
Establish vision, identifies and champions best practices, tools, and ideas to improve execution and quality.
Drive an organization of efficiency, accountability, and ownership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, STEM Majors, or related (Master’s preferred)
